title: Youâ€™re Doing Amazing Sweetie: A Kardashian Recap Show | It Was All A Stream
description:
This week, Amelia Wedemeyer and Zack Peter recap the fifth episode of 'The Kardashians.' Zack dives straight into the headline of the week: Did Kris Jenner really sleep with Drake? (3:50) Later on, the duo chat about Kris wanting to get cremated and placed into a necklace (14:00), then Amelia gives a hot take on Kendall (27:17), plus much more.
Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer and Zack Peter
Producer: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
